org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.std40

Class UAX29URLEmailTokenizer40

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.AttributeSource
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
        • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Tokenizer
          • org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.std40.UAX29URLEmailTokenizer40
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    Use UAX29URLEmailTokenizer

    @Deprecated
public final class UAX29URLEmailTokenizer40
extends Tokenizer
    Backcompat uax29 tokenizer for Lucene 4.0-4.6. This supports Unicode 6.1.
